pkgfinal

Class Ingredient

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkgfinal.Ingredient

  • public class Ingredient
extends java.lang.Object
    The Ingredient class stores information for ingredients that will be included in recipes and stored as part of a collection of recipes.

    • Constructor Summary
